content.description:
Directions: Select the choice that best fits each statement. The following question(s) refer to the following energy efficiencies, expressed percentages.
(A) 100%
(B) 95%
(C) 30%
(D) 15%
(E) 1%
content.question: The maximum efficiency possible in an energy-conversion process that is not limited by the second law of thermodynamics

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe environmental concepts and processes.
